text: Now a man named Ananias, together with Sapphira his wife, sold a piece of property.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3557">kept back</st> for himself <st data-num="575">part of</st> the <st data-num="5092" class="">proceeds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="1135">wife’s</st> <st data-num="4894" class="">knowledge;</st> he <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st><n id="2" /> only <st data-num="3313" class="">part</st> of it and <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> it <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles’</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="376">Ananias</st>, <st data-num="1223 5101">why</st> has <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> to <st data-num="5574" class="">lie</st> to the <st data-num="40">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3557" class="">keep back</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">yourself</st> <st data-num="575">part of</st> the <st data-num="5092" class="">proceeds</st> from the sale of<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5564" class="">land</st>?
Before it was sold, did it not belong to you? And when it was sold, was the money not at your disposal? How have you thought up this deed in your heart? You have not lied to people but to God!”
When Ananias heard these words he collapsed and died, and great fear gripped all who heard about it.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="3501">young men</st> <st data-num="450" class="">came</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4958" class="">wrapped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4958" class="">up</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1627" class="">carried</st> him <st data-num="1627" class="">out</st>, and <st data-num="2290" class="">buried</st><n id="3" /> him.

After an <st data-num="1292" class="">interval</st> of <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hours</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="1525">came in</st>, but she did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> what had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>.

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="3004">Tell</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, were the two of you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="591" class="">paid</st> <st data-num="5118" class="">this amount</st><n id="2" /> for the <st data-num="5564" class="">land</st>?” Sapphira<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, <st data-num="5118" class="">that much</st>.”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1161">then</st> told <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> have <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4856" class="">agreed together</st> to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>? <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>! The <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> of those who have <st data-num="2290" class="">buried</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> are <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="1627" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1627" class="">out</st>!”

<st data-num="3916">At once</st><n id="1" /> she <st data-num="4098" class="">collapsed</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1634" class="">died</st>. <st data-num="1161">So</st> when the <st data-num="3495">young men</st> <st data-num="1525">came in</st>, they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1627" class="">carried</st> her <st data-num="1627" class="">out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2290" class="">buried</st> her <st data-num="4314" class="">beside</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st>.
Great fear gripped the whole church and all who heard about these things.
Now many miraculous signs and wonders came about among the people through the hands of the apostles. By common consent they were all meeting together in Solomon’s Portico.

<st data-num="3762" class="">None</st> of the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="5111" class="">dared</st> to <st data-num="2853" class="">join</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="3170" class="">held</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> in <st data-num="3170">high honor</st>.<n id="2" />

More and <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believers</st> in the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> were <st data-num="4369" class="">added to</st> their number,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4128" class="">crowds</st> of <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>.

<st data-num="5620" class="">Thus</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1627" class="">carried</st> the <st data-num="772" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="1627" class="">out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4116">streets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2825" class="">cots</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">pallets</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> when <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2064">came by</st> at <st data-num="2579" class="">least</st> his <st data-num="4639" class="">shadow</st> would <st data-num="1982">fall on</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
A crowd of people from the towns around Jerusalem also came together, bringing the sick and those troubled by unclean spirits. They were all being healed.
Now the high priest rose up, and all those with him (that is, the religious party of the Sadducees), and they were filled with jealousy.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1911" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="1219" class="">public</st> <st data-num="5084" class="">jail</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">during</st> the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2374" class="">doors</st> of the <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1806" class="">led</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">out</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>,

“<st data-num="4198">Go</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2980" class="">proclaim</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.”

When they heard this, they entered the temple courts at daybreak and began teaching.

Now when the high priest and those who were with him arrived, they summoned the Sanhedrin—that is, the whole high council of the Israelites—and sent to the jail to have the apostles brought before them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="5257" class="">officers</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">so</st> they <st data-num="390" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st>,<n id="3" />

“We <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="1201" class="">jail</st> <st data-num="2808" class="">locked</st> <st data-num="803" class="">securely</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5441" class="">guards</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">doors</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> when we <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> them,<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="2080" class="">inside</st>.”

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="4755" class="">commander</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2411">temple guard</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532">and</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">report</st>,<n id="3" /> they were <st data-num="1280">greatly puzzled</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="4" /> wondering <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> could<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! The <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> you <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>!”
Then the commander of the temple guard went with the officers and brought the apostles without the use of force (for they were afraid of being stoned by the people).
When they had brought them, they stood them before the council, and the high priest questioned them,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “We <st data-num="3853" class="">gave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3852">strict orders</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>,<n id="4" /> you have <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="5" /> with <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1014" class="">intend</st> to <st data-num="1863" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444">man’s</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="611">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “We <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3980" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">forefathers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1453">raised up</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> seized and <st data-num="1315" class="">killed</st> by <st data-num="2910" class="">hanging</st> him <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="3586" class="">tree</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5312" class="">exalted</st> <st data-num="3778">him</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> as <st data-num="747" class="">Leader</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st>, to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st> to <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>.<n id="3" />
And we are witnesses of these events, and so is the Holy Spirit whom God has given to those who obey him.”
Now when they heard this, they became furious and wanted to execute them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> a <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st><n id="1" /> whose <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> was <st data-num="1059" class="">Gamaliel</st>,<n id="2" /> a <st data-num="3547">teacher of the law</st> who was <st data-num="5093" class="">respected</st> by <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="450">stood up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> to be <st data-num="4160" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> for a <st data-num="1024">short time</st>.

<st data-num="5037" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">council</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="435" class="">Men</st> of <st data-num="2475" class="">Israel</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4337">pay close attention</st> to<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you are <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4238" class="">do</st> <st data-num="1909">to</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">sometime</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">ago</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2333" class="">Theudas</st> <st data-num="450">rose up</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">claiming</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">somebody</st>, and <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5071" class="">400</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="4347" class="">joined</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st>. <st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="337" class="">killed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="3982" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> were <st data-num="1262" class="">dispersed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> of it.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> <st data-num="3778">him</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> the <st data-num="1057" class="">Galilean</st> <st data-num="450" class="">arose</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of the <st data-num="582" class="">census</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="868" class="">incited</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> to <st data-num="3694" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in revolt.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2548">He too</st> was <st data-num="622" class="">killed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="3982" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> were <st data-num="1287" class="">scattered</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3588 3568">in this case</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="868" class="">stay away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="863" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="863" class="">alone</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">plan</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2041">undertaking</st> originates <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,<n id="1" /> it will <st data-num="2647">come to nothing</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2314" class="">God</st>, you will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2647" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3379">or</st> you may <st data-num="2532">even</st> be <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2314">fighting against God</st>.” He <st data-num="3982">convinced</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4341" class="">summoned</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> and had them <st data-num="1194" class="">beaten</st>.<n id="1" /> Then<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3853" class="">ordered</st> them <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="630" class="">released</st> them.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="4198" class="">left</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoicing</st> <st data-num="3754">because</st> they had been <st data-num="2661" class="">considered worthy</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="818">suffer dishonor</st> <st data-num="5228">for the sake</st> of the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.<n id="2" />
And every day both in the temple courts and from house to house, they did not stop teaching and proclaiming the good news that Jesus was the Christ.
